data.text:
Lotta ta ta… Lovin! Lovin! 
Lotta ta ta… Ahh!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Lotta ta ta… Lovin! Lovin! 
<story>Lotta ta ta… Ahh!

data.text:
Dangit, I still can't do it! 
I just can't get into the rhythm.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Dangit, I still can't do it! 
<story>I just can't get into the rhythm.

data.text: Tokai Teio was dancing in the nearby park.

choices.text: Are you training for your winning live?
choices.processed: <size=43>Are you training for your winning live?</size>

choices.text: Are you training for your winning live?
choices.processed: <size=43>Are you training for your winning live?</size>

data.processed: <story>Tokai Teio was dancing in the nearby park.

data.text: Oh, hey Trainer. No, this isn't for that.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Oh, hey Trainer. No, this isn't for that.

data.text: I just love dancing games is all, so I'm training for that!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>I just love dancing games is all, so I'm training for that!

data.text:
Racing's all about who's fastest, right? Well 
dancing games are kinda different.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Racing's all about who's fastest, right? Well 
<story>dancing games are kinda different.

data.text:
While winning a race is important, 
looking the part is just as important! 
You've gotta look cool, cute, dazzling, and beautiful!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>While winning a race is important, 
<story>looking the part is just as important! 
<story>You've gotta look cool, cute, dazzling, and beautiful!

data.text:
It's amazing, isn't it? 
It's so much fun and the perfect hobby for someone 
as amazing and great as me! Nothing else can compare!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>It's amazing, isn't it? 
<story>It's so much fun and the perfect hobby for someone 
<story>as amazing and great as me! Nothing else can compare!

data.text: Or at least that's what I thought… haa…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Or at least that's what I thought… haa…

data.text: Yeah, someone managed to beat my highscore the other day.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Yeah, someone managed to beat my highscore the other day.

data.text:
My high score was 620,000 points, but they managed to 
get 999,999 points! They absolutely blew my score away…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>My high score was 620,000 points, but they managed to 
<story>get 999,999 points! They absolutely blew my score away…

data.text:
It made me so frustrated. I know I'm 
capable of more! That's why I've been practicing.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>It made me so frustrated. I know I'm 
<story>capable of more! That's why I've been practicing.

data.text:
But I've done everything I can think of! 
Trainer, could you come with me to the arcade?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>But I've done everything I can think of! 
<story>Trainer, could you come with me to the arcade?

data.text:
It's time for the real battle! 
I can do this, I know it! Here I go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>It's time for the real battle! 
<story>I can do this, I know it! Here I go!

data.text:
Whoo, it's a new personal best! But I'm 
nowhere near the high score. Traaiiner…
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: You can do this, I know it!

data.processed:
<story>Whoo, it's a new personal best! But I'm 
<story>nowhere near the high score. Traaiiner…

data.text:
Th-Thank you… You're right, 
giving up after one try isn't like me.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Th-Thank you… You're right, 
<story>giving up after one try isn't like me.

data.text:
I'm the unbeatable Teio! I just 
need to be more bouncy and light! 
Alright, it's time for round two!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I'm the unbeatable Teio! I just 
<story>need to be more bouncy and light! 
<story>Alright, it's time for round two!

data.text:
Another personal best! But I still 
didn't make it! Nngh, now what do I do…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Another personal best! But I still 
<story>didn't make it! Nngh, now what do I do…?

data.text: You can do it Miss!
data.name: Girl
data.processed: <story>You can do it Miss!

data.text: Wait, who're you?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Wait, who're you?

data.text: She's been watching you the entire time cheering you on.
data.name: Girl
data.processed: <story>She's been watching you the entire time cheering you on.

data.text: R-Really? Hey, so do you like watching dancing?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>R-Really? Hey, so do you like watching dancing?

data.text: Yup, I like it a lot! But…
data.name: Girl
data.processed: <story>Yup, I like it a lot! But…

data.text:
When you make a face like 
you're upset it makes me sad too…
data.name: Girl
data.processed:
<story>When you make a face like 
<story>you're upset it makes me sad too…

data.text:
Like I'm upset? Ah, when I get into 
a tight spot I probably make that face…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Like I'm upset? Ah, when I get into 
<story>a tight spot I probably make that face…

data.text:
Dance games are all about having fun. 
So if I'm upset while I'm playing it, 
I'll never be able to take the high score back.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Dance games are all about having fun. 
<story>So if I'm upset while I'm playing it, 
<story>I'll never be able to take the high score back.

data.text:
I can't change the things that make me 
frustrated, but smiling through them is 
important! If I can do that then I think I'll be 
able to move smoother! Isn't that right, Trainer?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I can't change the things that make me 
<story>frustrated, but smiling through them is 
<story>important! If I can do that then I think I'll be 
<story>able to move smoother! Isn't that right, Trainer?

data.text:
Okay, I'll keep trying! 
And no matter how many times it takes, I'll 
continue to smile through it until I finally pass the goal!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Okay, I'll keep trying! 
<story>And no matter how many times it takes, I'll 
<story>continue to smile through it until I finally pass the goal!

data.text:
Alright, let's try again! 
Everyone, thanks for cheering me on!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Alright, let's try again! 
<story>Everyone, thanks for cheering me on!

data.text:
And with everyone in the arcades' eyes 
glued to her, Tokai Teio began her quest!
data.processed:
<story>And with everyone in the arcades' eyes 
<story>glued to her, Tokai Teio began her quest!

data.text:
Haa… I stopped smiling for a second there… 
But I've still got so much left to do!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Haa… I stopped smiling for a second there… 
<story>But I've still got so much left to do!

data.text:
I finally passed the 900,000 threshold! 
I really can do this!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I finally passed the 900,000 threshold! 
<story>I really can do this!

data.text: Teio! Teio!
data.name: Arcade-goers
data.processed: <story>Teio! Teio!

data.text:
Thanks everyone. But I think I'm almost at my limit… 
My body's going to give up on me soon… but still…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Thanks everyone. But I think I'm almost at my limit… 
<story>My body's going to give up on me soon… but still…

data.text: Teio! Teio!
data.name: Arcade-goers
data.processed: <story>Teio! Teio!

data.text:
Hearing everyone cheer me on gives me strength! 
I just need to concentrate. 
This'll be my last chance.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hearing everyone cheer me on gives me strength! 
<story>I just need to concentrate. 
<story>This'll be my last chance.

data.text:
Huh, the sound stopped. 
Did I… make it…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Huh, the sound stopped. 
<story>Did I… make it…?

data.text:
Yaay! I hit the max points!! 
Trainer, Everyone, I did it!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yaay! I hit the max points!! 
<story>Trainer, Everyone, I did it!!

data.text:
Thanks! I almost gave up halfway 
through, but I'm so glad I didn't…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Thanks! I almost gave up halfway 
<story>through, but I'm so glad I didn't…

data.text:
Everyone here gave me the strength to move forward. 
Thanks to everyone, the unbeatable Teio 
became something even more than that!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: It's almost like a team victory, huh?
It's almost like a team victory, huh?

data.processed:
<story>Everyone here gave me the strength to move forward. 
<story>Thanks to everyone, the unbeatable Teio 
<story>became something even more than that!

data.text:
Yup, and not only did I manage to get the 
highscore, I had fun while I was doing it! 
That's why everyone felt so passionate.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yup, and not only did I manage to get the 
<story>highscore, I had fun while I was doing it! 
<story>That's why everyone felt so passionate.

data.text:
Ehehe, the score may be the same, 
but at least I beat my rival in artistic points!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, the score may be the same, 
<story>but at least I beat my rival in artistic points!

data.text: Huh…? Wait, isn't that that one machine…?
data.name: Arcade Staff
data.processed: <story>Huh…? Wait, isn't that that one machine…?

data.text: Huh…? Is something the matter?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh…? Is something the matter?

data.text:
I'm really sorry about this, but I forgot to reset 
the scores after I took it in for maintenance the other day.
data.name: Arcade Staff
data.processed:
<story>I'm really sorry about this, but I forgot to reset 
<story>the scores after I took it in for maintenance the other day.

data.text:
The top score stayed maxed out from the 
maintenance check, but I'll reset it now.
data.name: Arcade Staff
data.processed:
<story>The top score stayed maxed out from the 
<story>maintenance check, but I'll reset it now.

data.text:
Huuuh, so you're telling me that that high score wasn't 
because of my rival, but was because of the maintenance?!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Huuuh, so you're telling me that that high score wasn't 
<story>because of my rival, but was because of the maintenance?!

data.text:
Ahaha, that's actually so funny! I got so 
worked up over a rival that doesn't actually exist!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: Are you upset about how it ended?
Are you upset about how it ended?

data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, that's actually so funny! I got so 
<story>worked up over a rival that doesn't actually exist!

data.text:
A little, but it's okay. Thanks to that 
mistake I learned something important today.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>A little, but it's okay. Thanks to that 
<story>mistake I learned something important today.

data.text:
I learned the power of encouragement. 
Somehow, my fan's encouragement made 
the unbeatable Teio much much stronger!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I learned the power of encouragement. 
<story>Somehow, my fan's encouragement made 
<story>the unbeatable Teio much much stronger!

data.text:
Today was just practice, but next time 
we'll show our stuff on the real track! 
And I'll meet everyone's cheers with a dramatic victory!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Today was just practice, but next time 
<story>we'll show our stuff on the real track! 
<story>And I'll meet everyone's cheers with a dramatic victory!
